title: Lac puero[rum]. M. holti mylke for chyldren
author: Holte, John, grammarian.
publisher: By Wynkyn de worde, in Fletestrete in the sygne of the sonne,
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Includes two epigrams by Sir Thomas More.
In this edition the 95mm. textura types have normal w² --STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
